answers.answer: If you genuinely can not go at ALL, go to the hospital.  If it is just more difficult than usual, well, try more fluids.  But if you are literally blocked, go to Labor & Delivery and explain the situation, or go to the ER.

question: Hi ladies,Im 38 weeks pregnant today and im concerned because i went from having to make several trips to the restroom to less trips to suddenly today not being able to go at all.my feet and legs are swollen.I was tested for preeclampsia this week and results came back negative. Spoke to 2 different doctors and they told me i was fine that everything is normal. This just doesnt seem normal to me and i dont know what to do. Have any of you had this experience??
title: cant pee
